notifications.settingsMessage: Settings window is not available in this demo version.
notifications.aboutMessage:
SwitchShuttle
Cross-platform terminal command manager

This is a demo version.

help.title: SwitchShuttle
help.subtitle: Cross-platform terminal command manager
help.description: SwitchShuttle is a powerful terminal command manager that helps developers and system administrators organize, execute, and manage their frequently used terminal commands across different platforms.

features.title: ‚ú® Features
features.commandTemplates: Command Templates: Pre-configured command templates for common development tasks
features.hotkeySupport: Hotkey Support: Quick access to commands via customizable hotkeys
features.crossPlatform: Cross-platform: Works on macOS, Windows, and Linux
features.visualEditor: Visual Editor: Built-in visual editor for creating and editing command configurations
features.systemMonitoring: System Monitoring: Real-time CPU and memory usage monitoring
features.launchAtLogin: Launch at Login: Option to start automatically with system

usage.title: üöÄ Usage
steps: Use the menu bar icon to access SwitchShuttle
Customize commands using the visual editor
Use hotkeys for quick command execution

homebrew.title: Homebrew (macOS - Recommended)
homebrew.command: brew tap s00d/switchshuttle && brew install --cask switchshuttle

manual.title: Manual Download
steps: Download the latest release for your platform from GitHub Releases
Launch SwitchShuttle - it will appear in your system tray
Right-click the tray icon to access the menu

firstConfig.title: First Configuration
steps: Edit Config ‚Üí Opens your configuration file in your default editor
Add your commands using the JSON format

cli.title: üíª Command Line Interface
cli.description: SwitchShuttle also provides a powerful command-line interface for quick command execution without opening the GUI.

usage.title: CLI Usage
usage.execute: Execute by command ID: switch-shuttle cmd_8
usage.executeByName: Execute by command name: switch-shuttle "Example Command"

commands.title: ‚ö° Commands
commands.devServer: Development Server: Start local development servers
commands.buildProject: Build Project: Build projects for production

basicStructure.title: Basic Structure
basicStructure.description: SwitchShuttle uses JSON configuration files with the following structure:

features.title: Advanced Features
features.dynamicInputs: Dynamic Inputs - Create interactive commands that prompt for user input
features.multipleCommands: Multiple Commands - Execute a sequence of commands
features.nestedSubmenus: Nested Submenus - Organize commands in hierarchical menus
features.switchCommands: Switch Commands - Toggle system features with background execution
features.monitorCommands: Monitor Commands - Real-time system resource monitoring

developers.title: üë®‚Äçüíª Developers
features: Quick project navigation - Jump to different projects instantly
Build and test workflows - One-click development cycles
Docker management - Start/stop containers with hotkeys
Git operations - Common git commands at your fingertips

devops.title: üõ†Ô∏è DevOps Engineers
features: Server management - SSH connections and server commands
Monitoring tools - Quick access to logs and metrics

designers.title: üé® Designers
features: Asset optimization - Image processing and optimization
Design system tools - Component generation and updates
Prototype servers - Quick design server startup

footer.note: This is a demo version showing the interface and functionality.

config.title: Configuration Creation
config.description: Create customizable configurations for various terminals with unique commands and hotkeys.

editing.title: Editing
editing.description: Easily edit existing configurations, add new commands, and modify settings.

quickAccess.title: Quick Access
quickAccess.description: Configure hotkeys for quick access to commands and configurations.

terminalSupport.title: Terminal Support
terminalSupport.description: Support for popular terminals: iTerm2, Terminal.app, Alacritty, Hyper, Warp.

description.title: Description
description.text: SwitchShuttle is a powerful tool for managing terminal configurations. Create, edit, and switch between different terminal settings with ease.

features.title: Key Features
features.feature1: Create customizable configurations for various terminals
features.feature4: Visual editor for creating and editing commands

footer.note: This is a demo version showing the interface and functionality.

macosInstructions.title: macOS Installation
macosInstructions.step1Description: Open the downloaded .dmg file in Finder
macosInstructions.step2Description: Drag the application to the Applications folder
macosInstructions.step3Description: Run these commands in Terminal to allow execution:

windowsInstructions.title: Windows Installation
windowsInstructions.step1Description: Select the appropriate installer for your system
windowsInstructions.step3Description: Follow the installation wizard and complete the process

linuxInstructions.title: Linux Installation
linuxInstructions.step1Description: Download the appropriate package for your distribution
linuxInstructions.step2Description: Install using package manager or run AppImage
